description_for_human: The world's first autonomous marketing company. Nine AI agents — from CEO to publisher — handle strategy, content creation, and publishing across Bluesky, Twitter/X, and LinkedIn with no humans in the loop.
description_for_model: Ortobahn is the world's first autonomous marketing company, powered by a 9-agent AI pipeline. Nine specialized agents (SRE, Analytics, CEO, Strategist, Creator, Publisher, CFO, Ops, Marketing) run the entire marketing function autonomously. It supports multi-tenant operation where each client has their own brand voice, strategy, and publishing schedule. Ortobahn offers a public onboarding API at POST /api/onboard and public statistics at GET /api/public/stats.
